name: Zalman Cooling Stand - 575 rpm - Sleeve Bearing - Plastic, Steel

reviews.name: Zalman Cooling Stand
reviews.reviewText: This cooling pad does great in keeping your laptop cool. Nice size and easy to hold in your lap. I would recommend this product to any one. The fan is quiet I have to check if fan is on.
reviews.title: Great Cooling Stand

reviews.name: Zalman Cooling Stand
reviews.reviewText: The USB jack has and outlet on it for another USB, so it doesn't take up any jack space.
reviews.title: Keeps the computer cool on the bottom!

reviews.name: Zalman Cooling Stand
reviews.reviewText:
This product is really great and has kept my laptop far cooler than any other cooling stand that I've had in the past. My last cooling stand had only one fan that cooled the center of my laptop leaving the periphery hot. This product has fans throughout so that the entire base is being cooled. Its also a nice size- I'm sure it would accommodate really any size laptop. As some of the other reviewers stated its also super quiet... I can't even hear it.

Great purchase !
reviews.title: Great !

reviews.name: Zalman Cooling Stand
reviews.reviewText: This is a great cooling stand with one large fan witch is great. I use my lap top on my lap with this cooling stand its great and stays cool.
reviews.title: Cool cooling stand

reviews.name: Zalman Cooling Stand
reviews.reviewText: Very quiet: I had to check to see if fan was running. The perforated aluminum cover is cool to the touch. I'm sure this will help with the warm running Intel i7 quad core laptop.
reviews.title: Very quiet
